channel.title: SolarSonic's Homework
channel.description:
------------------------------------SOLARSONIC'S HOMEWORK------------------------------------
I will be starting a active company in which I pay Rs2 GP for forum members to do my homework and the reward will vary from how much problems done and the hardness.
To apply to do a homework, just PM me the answers for one of the current homework assignment(s) and your Rs2 username.
** NOTE ** - If any part of the homework is WRONG by alot and it looks as if you just wrote random stuff down, then you will not be allowed to participate in this anymore.
** NOTE ** - The homework is fifth grade work.
-------------------------------CURRENT ASSIGNMENTS-------------------------------------------
NONE

item.title: SolarSonic's Homework
item.dc:creator: @sh4d0ws sh4d0ws
item.description:
@sh4d0ws wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:11, topic:3682”][quote author=sh4d0ws link=topic=4481.msg47090#msg47090 date=1150160625]

^ Wow, you have no clue what your talking about, do you?

But seriously, you need to do your own work because you’ll fail in life if you don’t. The early stages of math are very important for you to learn, because if you cant do 49/7, then how are you going to do stuff like: AB[sup]2[/sup]3B[sup]5[/sup]+7A+345=5A[sup]2[/sup]8B[sup]3[/sup]+AB[sup]3[/sup]+212 (You’ll get that grade 10 or 11, and even then it’s very simple)

If you were talking to me yeah I do, I’m only in grade 8, so I don’t got a damn clue about what you’re talking about… I was just trying to get a point across about how easy grade 5 is. Everyone also remember that not every class is Math too, so using math examples won’t help…he’ll need to do other stuff aswell.
[/quote]

I was talking about how you said he is not legally allowed on this forum because of his age ;)[/quote]

I’ve forgotten where I had read it, but the CCAP ( or CCAAP or CAAPP or something like that =p) requires that all users registered at a forum must be over the age of 13, if not proof of signature (after parent permission) must be mailed or faxed to the forum administrator. I do not however, know if mopar can decide whether this will regard his site or not, and which regions/countries of the world it applies to. So yeah, I am right, and yeah, so are you =p.

Read full topic

Hell I didn’t even know any order of operations back then (bedmas …brackets…exponents…division…multiplication…subtraction and then the left to right rules for subtraction/addition and multiplication/division…for those of you that don’t know =p.)
